text: Kananjalo Senza abantu ababecingelwa ukuba akukho yabo yangaboabaphilailifaiziphalukazomhlabaeziseMpumalanga neziphaluka zawo eziseNtshonalanga eSasizisikelele. Ke kaloku ilizwi elilungileyo leNkosi yakho lazaliseka kuBantwana bakwaSirayeli, ngenxa yokunyamezela kwabo. Kananjalo Sayitshabalalisa yaphela nya imisebenzi emikhulu nezakhiwo zakwaFirâ€™awn ezazakhiwe ngabantu bakhe
